plays.text: Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Slashing Todd Marchant
Goal scored by Steve Staios assisted by Sean Brown and Anson Carter
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jaroslav Modry
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Steve Heinze
Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Charging Josh Green
Penalty to Josh Green 2 minutes for Roughing Mikko Eloranta
Penalty to Jere Karalahti 5 minutes for Fighting Steve Staios
Penalty to Steve Staios 5 minutes for Fighting Jere Karalahti
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator served by Shawn Horcoff
Penalty to Steve Staios 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Rem Murray 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Jaroslav Modry and Jason Allison
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Elbowing Eric Belanger
Goal scored by Jason Allison assisted by Lubomir Visnovsky and Steve Heinze
Goal scored by Craig Johnson assisted by Mikko Eloranta and Brad Chartrand
Goal scored by Brad Chartrand assisted by Mikko Eloranta and Craig Johnson
Goal scored by Georges Laraque assisted by Rem Murray and Domenic Pittis
Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Holding Mike Comrie
